definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Finally, the algorithm was applied to a quadratic sieve.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了算法在二次篩法中的應用。

sentences.english: Finally, using a sieve of Eratosthenes could give your program additional performance boost.
sentences.chinese: 最後，用篩法可以給你額外的性能提升方案。

sentences.english: The search method for twin prime pairs is gived in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出孿生素數的一種篩法，以及這種篩法的性質。

sentences.english: The search method for twin prime pairs is gived in the paper.
